rukus.text: 43|68|He amara bandagana! Aja tomadera kono bhaya ne'i ebam tomara cintita'o habe na.
43|69|Yara amara ayate imana enechila ebam yara chila musalima
43|70|tomara ebam tomadera strigana [1] sanande jannate prabesa kara.
43|71|Sbarnera thala o panapatra niye taderake pradaksina kara habe; sekhane mana ya caya ebam yate nayana trpta haya ta'i thakabe. Ara sekhane tomara sthayi habe.
43|72|Ara eta'i jannata, tomaderake yara adhikari kara hayeche, tomadera kajera phalasbarupa.
43|73|Sekhane tomadera jan'ya rayeche pracura phalamula, ta theke tomara khabe.
43|74|Niscaya aparadhira jahannamera sastite sthayi habe
43|75|tadera sasti laghaba kara habe na ebam tara tate hatasa haye parabe.
43|76|Ara amara tadera prati yuluma karini, kintu tara nijera'i chila yalima.
43|77|Tara citkara kare balabe, ‘he maleka [1], tomara raba yena amaderake nihsesa kare dena.’ Se balabe, ‘niscaya tomara abasthanakari habe.’
43|78|Allaha balabena, ‘abasya'i amara tamadera kache satya niye esechilama, kintu tomadera besira bhaga'i chile satya apachandakari.’
43|79|Naki tara kono byapare curanta sid'dhanta grahana kareche? Niscaya ami'i to curanta sid'dhantakari.
43|80|Naki tara mane kare ye, amara tadera gopana bisaya o mantrana sunate pa'i na? Abasya'i, hyam. Ara amadera pheresatagana tadera kache theke sabakichu likhache.
43|81|Baluna, ‘dayamaya allahara kono santana thakale ami hatama tamra ibadate ghrnakaridera agrani [1]
43|82|‘tara ya aropa kare ta theke asamanasamuha o yaminera raba ebam ‘arasera raba pabitra-mahana.
43|83|Ata'eba apani taderake chere dina tara magna thakuka behuda kathaya ebam matta thakuka khela-tamasaya ye dinera oyada deya hayeche tara sam'mukhina ha'oyara aga paryanta.
43|84|Ara tini'i satya ilah‌ asamane ebam tini'i satya ilah‌ yamine. Ara tini hikamata'oyala, sarbajna.

43|85|Ara tini barakatamaya, yara kartrtbe rayeche asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti samasta kichu. Ara kiyamatera jnana sudhu tamra'i ache ebam tamra'i kache tomaderake pratyabartita kara habe.
43|86|Ara tini chara tara yaderake dake, tara suparisera malika habe na, tabe tara chara, yara jene-sune satya saksya deya.
43|87|Ara yadi apani taderake jijnesa karena, ke taderake srsti kareche, tara abasya'i balabe, ‘allaha.’ Atahpara tara kothaya phire yacche
43|88|ara tara (rasula) e ukti: ‘He amara raba! Niscaya era emana sampradaya yara imana anabe na.’
43|89|Kaje'i apani taderake upeksa karuna ebam baluna, ‘salama' ; atahpara tara sighra'i janate parabe.
